snippet.title: No More Room in Hell 2 - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Here’s your gory first look at No More Room in Hell 2, the upcoming sequel to the 2011 cooperative first-person survival horror game. You and your fellow survivors must make your way through a dangerous world and survive together in eight-player co-op against hordes of the undead who feast on the living, but watch your back as this game features permadeath!

No More Room in Hell 2 is coming to PC in Early Access this Halloween (October 2024).

#IGN #Gaming
